name: Anydesk Remote Access Software Service Installation
description: Detects the installation of the anydesk software service. Which could be an indication of anydesk abuse if you the software isn't already used.
false_positives: Legitimate usage of the anydesk tool
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ServiceName:AnyDesk\ Service)`
